law.catch_line: Prohibition against imposition of requirements not provided by law.
law.text: A broker shall be prohibited from imposing any requirement on any subcontractor that is not provided for in this chapter, or in an administrative regulation promulgated under KRS Chapter 13A to carry out the provisions of the human service transportation delivery program.
law.history: Created 2000 Ky. Acts ch. 346, sec. 11, effective July 14, 2000.
